title: exercise of the powers conferred on me by section 1(2) of the Road Traffic Act
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Road Traffic Act 2024 (Commencement)
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Road Traffic Act 2024 (Commencement) 

(No. 2) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited road traffic act 2024 (commencement) (no 2) order 2024

title: exercise of the powers conferred on me by section 1(2) of the Road Traffic Act
heading: 2. The 31st day of May 2024 is appointed as the day on which Part 4 of the
text_raw:
2. The 31st day of May 2024 is appointed as the day on which Part 4 of the 

Road Traffic Act 2024 (No. 10 of 2024) shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my hand, 
 28 May 2024 

JACK CHAMBERS 
 Minister of State at the Department of Transport. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 31st May, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [251] 3
